category.name: Interface.Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMBOMAllowInContextAssign
preference.preference_description:
Enables considering the active context line of the Manufacturing Bill Of Material (MBOM) window during assignment the BOMLine from Engineering BOM to MBOM. When set to "true", the ID In Context (IDIC) value is created in context of the active context line and not the default top line. The default value is false.
Teamcenter needs to be restarted for any value change to take effect.
